34340073-e534-42ad-9cfb-8eab299228a9.description: The Image content type can be used to upload an image in various formats (JPG, GIF, PNG, SVG). The uploaded image should always have a high resolution so that it can be used flexibly, for example as a banner image. Plone automatically delivers the images in the best scaling, so there is no need to scale images down manually.
34340073-e534-42ad-9cfb-8eab299228a9.title: Image

description: The Grid block allows adding multi-column blocks. A grid block can contain between one and four columns of different blocks. Text, teasers, images and videos can be added in a grid block.

parent.description: The Grid block allows adding multi-column blocks. A grid block can contain between one and four columns of different blocks. Teasers and images can be added in a grid block.
parent.title: Grid

title: Grid-image block
